participant_1.name: Alex Mercer
participant_1.personality: Introverted and analytical, enjoys solitary activities and deep focus on projects.
participant_1.background: I am a recluse. I helped design the game Starcraft. I am working on building a robot to be my body double. I've an allergy to water. I am a famous Twitch streamer.

participant_2.name: Jamie Taylor
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, loves skateboarding and connecting with fellow artists.
participant_2.background: I have a broken arm. My favourite skater is Rob Dryden. I am always wearing a hat. My friends are all skateboarders.

content.text: Hello, i am from the united kingdom have you an allergy to water?
No, I don't have. Do you have?
I do not. I am a very experienced person. Are you a recluse?

Thank you for the conversation ‚ò∫Ô∏è 
It was nice to talk with you!
